ModMetaData.name: Pawn Badge - Command and Conquer
ModMetaData.author: Texas Redhawk
ModMetaData.description:
Update and combination of Texas Redhawks 2 mods for RimWorld 1.1 https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1752397431 https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1752390601
[img]https://i.imgur.com/GYswkZ7.png[/img]
Support-chat: https://invite.gg/mlie
Non-steam version: https://github.com/emipa606/PawnBadgeCC
- Combined the two mods into one and added the option to select badges from options instead.
--- Original Description --- Command and Conquer Global Defense Initiative and Command and Conquer Brotherhood of Nod rank icons addon for RangelReale's Pawn Badge.
Recommended for use with Telefonmast's Tiberium Rim.
Icons were sourced from the Command and Conquer wiki. I take no credit for their design.
